solution.text:
When two forces act in the same direction on an object, the net force is equivalent to the sum of the two forces.
Net force \(=_{j}_+_{k}_\)
\(\Rightarrow\)Net force\(=_{{j+k}}_N\)

content.text: If two forces, \(_{j}_N\) and \(_{k}_N\), act in the same direction on an object, the net force acting on the object is?
